description: This peanut butter banana nice cream recipe is made with only 3 ingredients. It's the healthy dessert you've been looking for, fast, simple and absolutely delicious!
keywords: healthy ice cream, low fat ice cream
name: 3 Ingredient Peanut Butter Banana Nice Cream Recipe
recipeIngredient: 4 cups frozen sliced bananas (, the browner they are when you freeze them the sweeter the end result)
1/2 cup PB2 powdered peanut butter (, see note)
4 tablespoons dairy-free milk (, use canned coconut milk for the most creamy version)
1/4 cup PB2 powdered peanut butter (, see note)

recipeInstructions.text: Put frozen bananas into a blender (you can also use a food processor). Pulse to chop into small pieces, you almost want it shredded. Make sure you pulse and not blend so that it doesnâ€™t get stuck.

Add milk and powdered peanut butter. Blend or pulse on low while stopping to move the mixture around. If you have a vitamix, the tamper will work well for this. Do not blend on high or the heat will melt the mixture.
Once it is the consistency of ice cream, pour into a bowl and serve topped with the toppings you want! If it's too soft, then freeze for about 2 hours to firm it up.
